## Basic statistics

# with palette insert a code chunk

```{r}
lipidomics %>% # or lipidomics |>
  group_by(metabolite) %>%
  summarise(across(
    value,
    list(
      mean = mean,
      sd = sd
    )
  )) %>%
  mutate(across(
    where(is.numeric),
    ~ round(.x, digits = 1)
  ))
```
